verbose_text: Furthermore, FGF-2 expression significantly correlated with CK19 expression, implying that promotion of fibrogenesis by FGF [XREF_BIBR] leads to increased gremlin expression that blocks BMP-7-mediated stem cell differentiation, which leads to proliferation in an immature state, as shown by higher CK19 positivity.
evidence: gremlin expression that blocks BMP-7-mediated stem cell differentiation
